trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_SEQ_00<tab>Baderon has information on a new task.

TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_SEQ_01<tab>According to Baderon, the Adventurers' Guild in Gridania is recruiting people for an as-yet-undisclosed task. You can learn more by speaking with Miounne, the proprietress of the Carline Canopy.
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_SEQ_02<tab>You have expressed your interest in the task to Miounne. Let her know when you are ready to hear the details.
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Miounne at the Carline Canopy in Gridania.
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_BADERON_000_1<tab>Ready to 'ear about that job, then? Like I said, the request comes from our sister guild in Gridania.
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_BADERON_000_2<tab>...An' that's all I know. But whatever it is ye get asked to do, I some'ow doubt it'd pose any trouble fer a 'venturer as survived the bedlam in Sastasha.
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_BADERON_000_3<tab>If ye think ye might be interested, ye'll want to 'ave words with Mother Miounne, me counterpart in Gridania. Good luck, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((mate)) /var>!
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_MIOUNNE_000_10<tab>Take a seat wherever you like, friend. Our waitress will come to take your─
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_MIOUNNE_000_11<tab>Oh, it's you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! 'Tis so good to see you again! ...What's that? Here at Baderon's suggestion, you say?

TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_MIOUNNE_000_12<tab>The foul-mouthed rogue sends me word that an adventurer might be along for the job, and it turns out to be you! Well, this makes things a lot easier, doesn't it?
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_MIOUNNE_000_13<tab>Oh? Not here to dine? Dare I hope that you're the adventurer Baderon sent word about? ...You are!? The Matron be praised!
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_MIOUNNE_000_14<tab>Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Miounne, and the Carline Canopy is my place.
TEXT_SUBSEA150_00676_MIOUNNE_000_15<tab>With regard to the task in question, there is a fair bit to tell. Let me know when you're ready to hear the details, and I shall brief you.
